name: Lone Colony
description:
Could you even last a week by yourself on an alien planet without running out of water, being eaten, or freezing to death? Lets see....

In this top-down survival game, you need to complete tasks to keep your equipment working, to provide water and warmth whilst you battle through the nights against an endless horde of slimey aliens.

This game was made in collaboration with fellow game jamer Michael Strand.
